oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Studies towards the synthesis of FCRR toxin: an expeditious entry into 7-5-6 ring systems via [5+2] oxidopyrylium-alkene cycloaddition
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KRISHNA, UM
TRIVEDI, GK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: <5+2>-cycloaddition
3-oxidopyrylium
derivatives
strategy
furans
fcrr toxin
indene
[5+2] cycloaddition
reductive cleavage
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Synthetic studies towards the diterpene natural product FCRR toxin have been undertaken. Ail intermolecular [5+2] oxidopyrylium-alkene cycloaddition reaction was employed to construct the 7-5-6 tricyclic framework. The reaction proceeded with very high regio- and stereoselectivity and the bridging ether was reductively cleaved to unmask the carbocycle. (C) 2003
